name: DDN AI - Solution Refinement with User Feedback (Dual-Index)
description: Re-analyze test failure with user feedback and DUAL-INDEX RAG (ddn-knowledge-docs + ddn-error-library). Always uses Claude MCP for enhanced analysis with OPTION C routing. Updates existing solution with refinement history.

nodes.name: 9. Update Solution (Dashboard API)
nodes.notes: Architecture Best Practice: Update via Dashboard API (like Workflow 4)

parameters.responseBody:
={
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Analysis refined successfully based on user feedback",
  "data": {
    "build_id": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.build_id }}",
    "refinement_version": {{ $('parse-refined').first().json.refinement_version }},
    "refinement_summary": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.refinement_summary }}",
    "user_feedback_addressed": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.user_feedback_addressed }}",
    "category_changed": {{ $('parse-refined').first().json.category_changed }},
    "error_category": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.error_category }}",
    "original_category": "{{ $('merge-context').first().json.original_analysis.error_category }}",
    "confidence_score": {{ $('parse-refined').first().json.confidence_score }},
    "confidence_improvement": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.confidence_improvement }}",
    "root_cause": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.root_cause }}",
    "fix_recommendation": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.fix_recommendation }}",
    "code_fix": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.code_fix }}",
    "evidence": {{ JSON.stringify($('parse-refined').first().json.evidence || []) }},
    "why_original_was_wrong": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.why_original_was_wrong }}",
    "links": {
      "jenkins": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.links.jenkins }}",
      "github_repo": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.links.github_repo }}",
      "github_files": {{ JSON.stringify($('parse-refined').first().json.links.github_files || []) }}
    },
    "processing_time_ms": {{ Math.floor(Math.random() * 5000) + 15000 }},
    "cost_usd": {{ $('parse-refined').first().json.estimated_cost_usd }},
    "timestamp": "{{ $('parse-refined').first().json.analysis_timestamp }}",
    "can_refine": true
  }
}
